```py
>>> ser = pd.Series(['a', 'b', 'c', 'a'], dtype='category')
>>> ser = ser.cat.reorder_categories(['c', 'b', 'a'], ordered=True)
>>> ser

3   a
dtype: category
Categories (3, object): ['c' < 'b' < 'a'] 
```

```py
dtype: category
```
